Posts.Content: justdiagnosed wrote: hi i am new here.i just been diagnosed with ductal/nos invasive mammary carcinoma last friday.i was at work when i rang my gp and asked for my biopsy results unfortunately it was a big blow for me finding out i have breast cancer.i am 35 years old,married with 2 children 5 y/o and 18 months old.i have family history of cancer but not breast cancer,i just thought maybe i am just the unlucky one to have caught it.my breast specialist told me that the lump is 2.3 cm,and the biospsy showed there is no lymphatic involvement and no microcalcification nor no definite carcinoma seen.i will be meeting my surgeon on thursday to discuss my treatment.i just want to know if anyone here has the same diagnosis and what was the treatment done.i worried that the cancer is spreading and i just want the best treatment so i can go on with my life again. Dx 5/5/2011, 2cm, Grade 3, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with bc justdiagnosed AJTAYLOR
